actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to authorize the construction of a water diversion structure on the Potomac River, Md., subject to execution of an agreement providing for equitable allocation of available water during low flow periods of the Potomac River.

summary.text: Grants the consent of Congress to the Washington Suburban Sanitary Commission for the construction of a water diversion structure on the Potomac River in Maryland. Authorizes the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Corps of Engineers, to enter into an agreement with other governmental authorities as to the allocation and withdrawal of water from the Potomac. Requires the signing of such agreement as a condition of Federal support for the project.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the construction of a water diversion structure on the Potomac River, Md., subject to execution of an agreement providing for equitable allocation of available water during low flow periods of the Potomac River.
